verses.verse: In the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H1113>Belshazzar<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H2370>had<s%> a <S%H2493>dream<s%> and <S%H2376>visions<s%> of his <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> his <S%H4903>bed<s%>: <S%H116>then<s%> he <S%H3790>wrote<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%>, and <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H7217>sum<s%> of the <S%H4406>matters<s%>.

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, I <S%H2370%H1934>saw<s%> in my <S%H2376>vision<s%> <S%H5974>by<s%> <S%H3916>night<s%>, and, <S%H718>behold<s%>, the <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7308>winds<s%> of the <S%H8065>heaven<s%> <S%H1519>strove<s%> upon the <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H3221>sea<s%>.
And <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H2423>beasts<s%> came <S%H5559>up<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H3221>sea<s%>, <S%H8133>diverse<s%> <S%H1668>one<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H1668>another<s%>.

The <S%H6933>first<s%> was like a <S%H744>lion<s%>, and had <S%H5403>eagle's<s%> <S%H1611>wings<s%>: I <S%H1934%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> the <S%H1611>wings<s%> thereof were <S%H4804>plucked<s%>, and it was lifted <S%H5191>up<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>, and made <S%H6966>stand<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H7271>feet<s%> as a <S%H606>man<s%>, and a <S%H606>man's<s%> <S%H3825>heart<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to it.

And <S%H718>behold<s%> <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H2423>beast<s%>, a <S%H8578>second<s%>, <S%H1821>like<s%> to a <S%H1678>bear<s%>, and it raised <S%H6966>up<s%> itself on <S%H2298>one<s%> <S%H7859>side<s%>, and it had <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5967>ribs<s%> in the <S%H6433>mouth<s%> of it <S%H997>between<s%> the <S%H8128>teeth<s%> of it: and they <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> unto it, <S%H6966>Arise<s%>, <S%H399>devour<s%> <S%H7690>much<s%> <S%H1321>flesh<s%>.

<S%H870>After<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> I <S%H1934%H2370>beheld<s%>, and <S%H718>lo<s%> <S%H317>another<s%>, like a <S%H5245>leopard<s%>, which had <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H1355>back<s%> of it <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H1611>wings<s%> of a <S%H5776>fowl<s%>; the <S%H2423>beast<s%> had also <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H7217>heads<s%>; and <S%H7985>dominion<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to it.

<S%H870>After<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> I <S%H1934%H2370>saw<s%> in the <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>visions<s%>, and <S%H718>behold<s%> a <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast<s%>, <S%H1763>dreadful<s%> and <S%H574>terrible<s%>, and <S%H8624>strong<s%> <S%H3493>exceedingly<s%>; and it had <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H8128>teeth<s%>: it <S%H399>devoured<s%> and brake in <S%H1855>pieces<s%>, and <S%H7512>stamped<s%> the <S%H7606>residue<s%> with the <S%H7271>feet<s%> of it: and <S%H1932>it<s%> was <S%H8133>diverse<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> that were <S%H6925>before<s%> it; and it had <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%>.

I <S%H1934%H7920>considered<s%> the <S%H7162>horns<s%>, and, <S%H431>behold<s%>, there came <S%H5559>up<s%> <S%H997>among<s%> them <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H2192>little<s%> <S%H7162>horn<s%>, <S%H6925%H4481>before<s%> whom there were <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H6933>first<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> plucked up by the <S%H6132>roots<s%>: and, <S%H431>behold<s%>, in <S%H1668>this<s%> <S%H7162>horn<s%> were <S%H5870>eyes<s%> like the <S%H5870>eyes<s%> of <S%H606>man<s%>, and a <S%H6433>mouth<s%> <S%H4449>speaking<s%> great <S%H7260>things<s%>.

¶ I <S%H1934%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> the <S%H3764>thrones<s%> were cast <S%H7412>down<s%>, and the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>days<s%> did <S%H3488>sit<s%>, whose <S%H3831>garment<s%> was <S%H2358>white<s%> as <S%H8517>snow<s%>, and the <S%H8177>hair<s%> of his <S%H7217>head<s%> like the <S%H5343>pure<s%> <S%H6015>wool<s%>: his <S%H3764>throne<s%> was like the <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H7631>flame<s%>, and his <S%H1535>wheels<s%> as <S%H1815>burning<s%> <S%H5135>fire<s%>.

A <S%H5135>fiery<s%> <S%H5103>stream<s%> <S%H5047>issued<s%> and came <S%H5312>forth<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him: <S%H506>thousand<s%> <S%H506>thousands<s%> <S%H8120>ministered<s%> unto him, and ten <S%H7240>thousand<s%> times ten <S%H7240>thousand<s%> <S%H6966>stood<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him: the <S%H1780>judgment<s%> was <S%H3488>set<s%>, and the <S%H5609>books<s%> were <S%H6606>opened<s%>.

I <S%H1934%H2370>beheld<s%> <S%H116>then<s%> <S%H4481>because<s%> of the <S%H7032>voice<s%> of the <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H4406>words<s%> which the <S%H7162>horn<s%> <S%H4449>spake<s%>: I <S%H1934%H2370>beheld<s%> even <S%H5705>till<s%> the <S%H2423>beast<s%> was <S%H6992>slain<s%>, and his <S%H1655>body<s%> <S%H7>destroyed<s%>, and <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H3346>burning<s%> <S%H785>flame<s%>.

As concerning the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H2423>beasts<s%>, they had their <S%H7985>dominion<s%> taken <S%H5709>away<s%>: yet their <S%H2417>lives<s%> were <S%H3052>prolonged<s%> <S%H5705>for<s%> a <S%H2166>season<s%> and <S%H5732>time<s%>.

I <S%H1934%H2370>saw<s%> in the <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>visions<s%>, and, <S%H718>behold<s%>, one like the <S%H1247>Son<s%> of <S%H606>man<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H6050>clouds<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and <S%H4291>came<s%> <S%H5705>to<s%> the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>days<s%>, and they brought him <S%H7127>near<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him.

And there was <S%H3052>given<s%> him <S%H7985>dominion<s%>, and <S%H3367>glory<s%>, and a <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, that <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H5972>people<s%>, <S%H524>nations<s%>, and <S%H3961>languages<s%>, should <S%H6399>serve<s%> him: his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H7985>dominion<s%>, which shall <S%H3809>not<s%> pass <S%H5709>away<s%>, and his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> that which shall <S%H3809>not<s%> be <S%H2255>destroyed<s%>.

¶ <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> was <S%H3735>grieved<s%> in my <S%H7308>spirit<s%> in the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of my <S%H5085>body<s%>, and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> me.

I came <S%H7127>near<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> <S%H2298>one<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> them that stood <S%H6966>by<s%>, and <S%H1156>asked<s%> <S%H4481>him<s%> the <S%H3330>truth<s%> of <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%>. So he <S%H560>told<s%> me, and made me <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H4406>things<s%>.

<S%H459>These<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> <S%H2423>beasts<s%>, <S%H581>which<s%> are <S%H703>four<s%>, are <S%H703>four<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%>, which shall <S%H6966>arise<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>.

But the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the most <S%H5946>High<s%> shall <S%H6902>take<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H2631>possess<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H5705>for<s%> <S%H5957>ever<s%>, even <S%H5705>for<s%> <S%H5957>ever<s%> and <S%H5957>ever<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> I <S%H6634>would<s%> know the <S%H3321>truth<s%> <S%H5922>of<s%> the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast<s%>, which <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H8133>diverse<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the others, <S%H3493>exceeding<s%> <S%H1763>dreadful<s%>, whose <S%H8128>teeth<s%> were of <S%H6523>iron<s%>, and his <S%H2953>nails<s%> of <S%H5174>brass<s%>; which <S%H399>devoured<s%>, brake in <S%H1855>pieces<s%>, and <S%H7512>stamped<s%> the <S%H7606>residue<s%> with his <S%H7271>feet<s%>;

And <S%H5922>of<s%> the <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> that were in his <S%H7217>head<s%>, and of the <S%H317>other<s%> which came <S%H5559>up<s%>, and <S%H4481%H6925>before<s%> whom <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5308>fell<s%>; even of that <S%H7162>horn<s%> <S%H1797>that<s%> had <S%H5870>eyes<s%>, and a <S%H6433>mouth<s%> that <S%H4449>spake<s%> very great <S%H7260>things<s%>, whose <S%H2376>look<s%> was <S%H4481>more<s%> <S%H7229>stout<s%> <S%H4481>than<s%> his <S%H2273>fellows<s%>.
I <S%H1934%H2370>beheld<s%>, and the <S%H1797>same<s%> <S%H7162>horn<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> <S%H7129>war<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H6922>saints<s%>, and <S%H3202>prevailed<s%> against them;

<S%H5705>Until<s%> the <S%H6268>Ancient<s%> of <S%H3118>days<s%> <S%H858%H1768>came<s%>, and <S%H1780>judgment<s%> was <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the most <S%H5946>High<s%>; and the <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H4291>came<s%> that the <S%H6922>saints<s%> <S%H2631>possessed<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>.

<S%H3652>Thus<s%> he <S%H560>said<s%>, The <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H2423>beast<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> upon <S%H772>earth<s%>, which shall be <S%H8133>diverse<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H4437>kingdoms<s%>, and shall <S%H399>devour<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H772>earth<s%>, and shall tread it <S%H1759>down<s%>, and break it in <S%H1855>pieces<s%>.

And the <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H7162>horns<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> this <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> are <S%H6236>ten<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%> that shall <S%H6966>arise<s%>: and <S%H321>another<s%> shall <S%H6966>rise<s%> <S%H311>after<s%> them; and he shall be <S%H8133>diverse<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H6933>first<s%>, and he shall <S%H8214>subdue<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%>.

And he shall <S%H4449>speak<s%> great <S%H4406>words<s%> <S%H6655>against<s%> the most <S%H5943>High<s%>, and shall wear <S%H1080>out<s%> the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the most <S%H5946>High<s%>, and <S%H5452>think<s%> to <S%H8133>change<s%> <S%H2166>times<s%> and <S%H1882>laws<s%>: and they shall be <S%H3052>given<s%> into his <S%H3028>hand<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> a <S%H5732>time<s%> and <S%H5732>times<s%> and the <S%H6387>dividing<s%> of <S%H5732>time<s%>.

But the <S%H1780>judgment<s%> shall <S%H3488>sit<s%>, and they shall take <S%H5709>away<s%> his <S%H7985>dominion<s%>, to <S%H8046>consume<s%> and to <S%H7>destroy<s%> it <S%H5705>unto<s%> the <S%H5491>end<s%>.

And the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> and <S%H7985>dominion<s%>, and the <S%H7238>greatness<s%> of the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, shall be <S%H3052>given<s%> to the <S%H5972>people<s%> of the <S%H6922>saints<s%> of the most <S%H5946>High<s%>, whose <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H7985>dominions<s%> shall <S%H6399>serve<s%> and <S%H8086>obey<s%> him.

<S%H5705%H3542>Hitherto<s%> is the <S%H5491>end<s%> of the <S%H4406>matter<s%>. As for <S%H576>me<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, my <S%H7476>cogitations<s%> <S%H7690>much<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> me, and my <S%H2122>countenance<s%> <S%H8133>changed<s%> in <S%H5922>me<s%>: but I <S%H5202>kept<s%> the <S%H4406>matter<s%> in my <S%H3821>heart<s%>.
